column1: betty lou pennington | of betty pennington. mrs. betty lou shelton pennington
column3: of creston passed away saturday afternoon at life care center of banner elk. funeral services are incomplete at this time. mrs. pennington is survived by:her husband oscar bruce pennington2 sons richard pennington of north wilkesboro. earl pennington of creston2 brothers j. b. shelton of creston. randy shelton of lenoir2 sisters chris shelton of lenoir. sue wallace of shady valley
column4: tn7 grandchildren; several nieces and nephews also survive.
